displayName.text: Dear Irving on Hudson Rooftop Bar

formattedAddress: 310 W 40th St, New York, NY 10018, USA

authorAttributions.displayName: Dear Irving on Hudson Rooftop Bar
Dear Irving on Hudson Rooftop Bar

adrFormatAddress: 310 W 40th St, New York, NY 10018, USA

editorialSummary.text: Cocktail parlor at Aliz Hotel serving fancy drinks & bites in a swanky space with Midtown views.

originalText.text:
3.5 / 5.0 - Dear Irving on Hudson is a good option for a rooftop bar in Midtown with amazing views of the city. They have 2 floors on the 40F and 41F of Aliz Hotel Times Square. It is mostly inside, with a small outdoor balcony area.

I personally prefer the 41F, which has a more luxurious feel, but my recent visits have been to the 40F.
The 40F has some seats by the windows to enjoy the stunning views, as well as a couple of seats outdoors on the balcony and more comfortable sofa seating inside.

Every time I've visited recently, they've had an event on the east side, facing Times Square. The west side still has views of Hudson Yards, and also south views, from the balcony. However, during my most recent visit, the party on the other side was so loud with their screaming and cheering every few minutes it was quite disturbing and we could barely hear ourselves talk.

As with many other rooftop bars, you are here for the views and experience. Cocktails are $19 with an additional 20% service charge automatically added to your bill. So I was not pleased with our latest experience, but as long as you don’t have to deal with excessively loud parties, you should be fine.

text.text:

originalText.text: My son made reservations to this amazing rooftop cocktail bar. The views were amazing! The interior is small and cozy with classy speakeasy style lounge chairs and couches. The views of NYC from this area are great. The drink menu was somewhat intimidating for me being that I am not a typical cocktail drinker. However, the server was very patient in describing what the drinks contained as he added recommendations for me. After visiting the restroom, I made my way to the back section, behind the elevators where I unexpectedly found an outdoor section with even better views compared to those from the other side of the building! The amazing views of the NY skyline are what make this cocktail bar a hit!

originalText.text: I recommend this place starting with the excellent drinks they have, I was able to try several of them on the recommendation of Adrian and Glendi, thank you for your wonderful attention. The view and atmosphere of the place 10/10!

text.text: I recommend this place starting with the excellent drinks they have, I was able to try several of them on the recommendation of Adrian and Glendi, thank you for your wonderful attention. The view and atmosphere of the place 10/10!

originalText.text: Advice- make reservation on time! Wonderful views of the city, even on a rainy/cloudy day. Cocktails are ok, small bites as well. You do have to order at least 1 alcoholic beverage per person and 20 % service fee is included.

text.text: Advice- make reservation on time! Wonderful views of the city, even on a rainy/cloudy day. Cocktails are ok, small bites as well. You do have to order at least 1 alcoholic beverage per person and 20 % service fee is included.

originalText.text: Such an Amazing place with a great view from all the rooms, had such a fun date. will definitely visit again, it’s giving Great gasby/James bond vibes. Loved The host Devin she was so nice and very attentive, gave us the best table! Superb :)
